articles.title: China reports 13,000 Covid cases, most since end of Wuhan's first wave
articles.description: The highly transmissible Omicron variant has spread to more than a dozen provinces, rattling China's "zero-Covid" strategy which had until March successfully kept the daily caseload down to double or triple digits.
